name: A Spikey Adventure!
description:
(AKA Spikedog RPG) is a small [s4s] game I've been wanting to make for fun. It's about Spikedog going on an adventure inside the Esforest (and possibly some other places, too) and will meet many friends and foes along the way!

It will feature a story, [s4s] memes, board-tans and many OC (including a few brand new ones specifically for this game)

For any file submission and collaboration email me at dusknezzu@gmail.com
